item.title: Papal conclave live updates: Cardinals return for afternoon session
item.description: Catholic cardinals are gathering at the Vatican to elect the successor to Pope Francis, who died on April 21.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump announcing trade deal with UK
item.description: This will mark the first agreement after President Donald Trump imposed steep tariffs on dozens of trading partners.

item.title: WATCH: Black smoke rises from Sistine Chapel as conclave continues
item.description: Thick black smoke poured out of the Sistine Chapel’s chimney on Thursday morning, signaling the conclave’s 133 cardinals have not decided on a new pop...

item.title: 1 student killed, 2 hurt in stabbing outside their high school; suspects at large
item.description: One student was killed and two others were wounded in a stabbing outside their Southern California high school, authorities said.

item.title: LIVE: Trump announces trade deal with UK: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
